PIN.Settings.MacroShorthand.Name: Shortened macro syntax
PIN.Settings.MacroShorthand.Hint: Enable a shortened macro syntax that allows referencing attributes directly, for example @str instead of @attributes.str.value. Disable this if you need to reference the full attribute model, for example @attributes.str.label.
PIN.Settings.InitiativeFormula.Name: Initiative formula
PIN.Settings.InitiativeFormula.Hint: Enter an initiative formula, such as d20+@dex
PIN.Notify.GroupAttrDuplicate: Attribute group already exists as an attribute.
PIN.Notify.GroupAlphanumeric: Attribute group names may not contain spaces or periods.
PIN.Notify.GroupReserved: Attribute group "{key}" is reserved and cannot be used.
PIN.Notify.AttrDuplicate: Attribute key already exists as a group.
PIN.Notify.AttrInvalid: Attribute keys may not contain spaces or periods.
PIN.Attribute.Label: Label
PIN.Group.DeleteContent: Do you wish to delete this group? This will delete the following group and all attributes included in it:
